Bitdefender Mobile Security & Antivirus is a next-gen security solution for Android devices focused on little (to zero) system or battery impact while providing access to a number of security functions in order to help you have a safer and more informed Android experience.
Should you have any questions regarding how the product works, please contact us.

"Antitheft makes sure your device never gets lost or stollen. These are some of the things it facilitates exceptionally well: - Remotely locate, lock or wipe your device - Hear what's happening around it - Send commands through SMS - SIM change alerts - Password protected settings"

Privacy Advisor shows you how installed apps use, and possibly abuse, your personal information and treat your privacy. It checks your apps against Bitdefender’s constantly updated Cloud database, calculates your device’s “Privacy Score”, and then informs you as to which apps are sacrificing your privacy.
With the Malware Scanner you can check if the applications installed on your phone are a danger in any way.

"Web Security keeps you safe against rogue / malicious sites and their traps while you browse the Internet using the default Android browser. Whenever you access a site that contains phishing, fraud, malware or simply isn't trusted, Web Security kicks in to warn you about it."
"We'll try to analyze %s as soon as possible. Thank you!"
Anti-Theft functions are unavailable on your Android version (%s). Remote locate, lock and wipe are available on Android 2.2 and above.

"\"Don't be fooled by its feather-light appearance: Bitdefender is a solid security suite that will keep your Android device clean\""
"You're about to secure your Android with TOTAL PROTECTION!"
Make sure Bitdefender Mobile Security is fully configured:

Expand to see the description for the clues. These are the clues we have discovered from a complex analysis process. In most of the cases they are not included by the developer but by the mobile ad frameworks, the ones that are collecting the data as well.

If you consider that the application is dangerous you can choose to uninstall it. This will improve your score with a number of points depending on the danger level of the app.

Protect your privacy by locking your sensitive apps (such as SMS, mails or photos) with a PIN Code. To protect an app, check it in the list. Next time someone tries to open it, Bitdefender will ask for your PIN Code before allowing access. Note that your Bitdefender PIN Code can be different than your Lock-Screen protection code or gesture.

Configure App Lock from App Lock Settings to request your PIN every time you open protected apps, or have a 30 seconds timeout.
"The trusted number is used to automatically receive an SMS notification when the SIM gets changed. Also, the WIPE command can only be sent from the trusted number."

Privacy Advisor gives you detailed info about what your installed apps are doing in background without your knowledge.

What is the Privacy Score?

The privacy score is calculated based on your applications score given by the danger level of their clues.

The lower the score the more dangerous are your applications and you should take care.

"The Event Viewer provides you with an insight into the tasks performed by Bitdefender Mobile Security since it was installed.
Should the logs get too big, you can always clear them by using the \"Clear log\" function, available from the menu button."

In case you have forgot your account password, you can use this screen to request a password reset. If the email address you type here matches your existing account, you will receive a password reset link in your email.

"Congratulations for installing Bitdefender Mobile Security!
To start, log in to MyBitdefender using your Google account or an existing MyBitdefender account."

"Press \"Start scanning\" to scan all the applications on your device. If malware is found, it will be listed below, with a shortcut to uninstall it.
Turn on \"Scan Storage\" to include your storage when scanning for malware. The storage will also be (re)scanned every time it is mounted, such as after it is connected to a computer or replaced."

"View and change your MyBitdefender account and licensing information.
Log out to use a different MyBitdefender account.
Buy a license or extend the existing one to benefit from web security, remote lock, remote wipe and remotely send message features."

"Web Security keeps you safe against rogue / malicious sites and their traps while you browse the Internet using the default Android browser.

"Enjoy complete protection with Bitdefender Mobile Security. Its superior feature set includes Anti-Malware Protection, Privacy Advisor, Device Locator, Web Security, Remote Lock, Wipe and Alerts."

"Keep your Android protected thanks to Bitdefender's scanning technology and its impressive detection rates. Next to user-triggered scans, Bitdefender Mobile Security automatically scans any application immediately after its install."
"Some apps peek into your private data or access the internet without asking for your permission. Privacy Advisor is here to make sure this doesn't happen."
"Keeps you away from webpages loaded with malware, phishing or fraudulent content. It's cloud-based so it's always up to date."

"Remotely locate, lock, wipe, send a message or even hear what's happening around your stolen or lost Android device. Remotely control your device via SMS commands or online through any browser.
You need this."

The page you are trying to view is not safe
New! Extend Bitdefender Mobile Security to your smart watch
With WearON, the new Bitdefender Mobile Security functionality for your smart watch, you will never forget your phone and quickly find it with one tap.
With Phone Alert your smart watch will vibrate when you step too far away from your phone.
"With Scream you will launch an alarm on your phone, even if it's on silent mode, using your smart watch."

Bitdefender Reports displays your overall security status and the tasks performed by Bitdefender Mobile Security in the current week, as well the activity from the previous week. Follow the Tip of the Week to boost the security of your Android and what you store on it. Your weekly report resets every Sunday night.

The Event Viewer provides you with an insight into all the tasks performed by Bitdefender Mobile Security since it was installed. You can always clear them by using the “Clear Event Viewer” function, available from the menu button.

Use App Lock to protect your photos and messages from unwanted eyes
Remember! Public WiFi networks are a real threat to your phone’s security
To be protected by Bitdefender’s Web Security you should use the default Android browser or Chrome
Use App Lock to protect your phone’s Settings and prevent unwanted changes to your phone’s configuration
"With the 'CALLME' SMS command you can make your phone call you with the speaker turned on"
Send the SMS command bd-123456 LOCATE, where 123456 is replaced with your PIN Code, and get back a SMS with the phone’s location on Google Maps!
What if I forgot my Bitdefender PIN Code? No worries! Just go to https://my.bitdefender.com, Antitheft, choose More Actions and click on “Show password”
What’s the first thing you should do if you can’t find your phone? Grab a friend’s phone and send the LOCATE command! If your phone is nearby you can make it SCREAM
Don’t forget to uncheck “Install from unknown sources” setting for extra-security!
Remember to use App Lock to prevent unwanted access to your apps!
You still have malware. Tap to see the weekly report
